funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the Laboratoire d'Excellence “Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases” (grant ANR-10-LABX-62-IBEID) and the Equipe FRM DEQ20150331759 grant from the French Fondation pour la Recherche Médicale (to MV). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
